body.name: DMI Egg Crate Sculpted Foam Chair Cushion, Seat Cushion, Car Seat Cushion, Office Chair Cushion Relieves Back Pain, Tail Bone Pain, Sciatica, 32 X 18 X 3 inches, Full Back,1 Count

features: SCULPTED FOAM SEAT CUSHION provides comfort and support by turning any uncomfortable office chair, car seat or wheelchair into a comfortable area to sit with full back support
SEAT CUSHION is constructed of medical grade egg crate foam to help reduce or heal pressure sores by taking weight off sensitive areas and improving air circulation

CHAIR CUSHION is great for using on office chairs, kitchen chairs, car seat, wheelchairs or recliners to help reduce back pain, hip discomfort, sciatica, pregnancy back pain, herniated discs, tailbone injuries and hemorrhoids

ERGONOMIC LUMBAR SUPPORT BACK provides excellent support and comfort for everyday use or after surgery or injuries. The convoluted cushion surface helps add padding and cushion to any surface. It's made with a non-skid material that stays in place and won't move around
CHAIR PILLOW SIZE: 32 X 18 X 3. Medical grade foam is spot clean only
body.description: This convoluted (egg crate) foam seat cushion with full back will add comfort to any chair and relieve pain when sitting for long periods of time. If you use a wheelchair or need to sit for extended periods in a regular chair, this soft cushion can give you more comfort. Made of medical grade foam, this cushion helps to better distribute your weight and promote better air circulation. It can help to prevent or heal pressure sores.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great, what I was looking for but I did cut top from bottom n out under my recliner cover n fit n comfort is amazing for my Sciatica issues! Thank you ! Pray foam holds up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable & works well
reviews.reviewText: Was late in shipping, Had asked for replacement & received it, All in all has worked very well , When it did arrive decided we would rather keep it & pay for it as we are using both now, Have no problem paying for it, Both are very comfortable for my husband which matters most. Thank you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable and good size.
reviews.reviewText: I love it for comfort and size, but I have only had it made one week and the blue is fading to be a nasty looking yellow/green color. Looks awful and dirty looking. Needs a better color or better dye.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helped a lot with bed sore
reviews.reviewText: Dad came home from hospital with a bed sore and we put 2 of these in the 2 chairs he uses most to help take some pressure off. It helped a lot while he got back on his feet.Then we bought a second one for the cat. The cat is 20 years old and started sleeping on the one we bought for dad so we got one for him and put it on the floor in his favorite sleeping spot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I received this cushions yesterday. I went to adjust the position and a huge piece tore right off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars comfortable but started tearing alrready
reviews.reviewText: I bought two. one for me one for my husband. Both are already tearing too bad because my husband found it comfortable helpimg sciatica. Would not recommend sadly. Wish they used a better material.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Placed this in my dad's wheelchair for added padding and comfort. Takes the pressure off his back as well as his bottom!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I first bought the seat only version which I liked. Then bought this version thinking the seat would feel the same. Boy was I wrong. The seat on this one feels to hard and not comfortable. It was hurting.
